title: Allow instantiating FrmMain with an in-memory only Settings instance
author: sparerd
body_snippet:
Currently, we access the global `Settings.Default` instance everywhere in the app. This settings instance loads and saves information from a file. This makes automated acceptance testing of the entire app difficult because testing state may be persisted outside of tests. Refactor our use of `Settings` so we can pass an instance of the class to the `FrmMain` constructor.

This will allow us to easily perform automated acceptance testing of user settings.
